index.title: Deck Tracker
index.description: Welcome to Deck Tracker! This app uses NFC technology to help you scan, track, and organize your cards effortlessly. Tap 'Start' to begin exploring!

sign_in.title: Sign in with
sign_in.description: Sign in with your Google account for a personalized experience, or continue as a guest to explore the app.

decks.title: My Decks
decks.description: Here, you can view all your saved decks. Manage, edit, or track them easily from this page.

builder.title: New Deck
builder.description: Start building your deck! Add cards, organize them, and prepare for your next game.

dialog.share: Your deck log has been copied to the clipboard for easy sharing.

delete.title: Delete Deck
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this deck? This action cannot be undone.

tracker.title: Deck Tracker
tracker.description: Use this feature to track your cards in real-time during a game. Simply scan your cards to update your deck's status.

dialog.title: Card Tracking Tutorial
dialog.content: On this page, you can scan cards while playing. When a card is scanned, it will be removed from the deck. Scanning it again adds it back. Tap OK to proceed.

reader.title: Card Reader
reader.description: Use this tool to scan cards and view their details or status in real-time.

games.title: Games
games.description: Choose the game you are playing to customize your decks and track your cards.

search.title: Search
search.description: Looking for a card? Use the search feature to find specific cards across all your games.

card.title: Card info
card.description: Manage individual card details here. Add a name, description, and upload an image to personalize your cards.

dialog.add_success: Card successfully added to your deck!
dialog.add_fail: Could not add the card to your deck.
dialog.read_fail: Failed to read the NFC tag.
dialog.write_fail: Failed to write to the NFC tag.

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Create unique custom cards with personalized images and descriptions. Perfect for homebrew decks or special rules.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize your experience. Manage your account, adjust preferences, and explore additional features here.

library.title: Library
library.description: Browse all the cards and decks you have created or saved. Use this as a reference during games.
